MajorClaims.Text: cheap flight can make many serious problem
the drawbacks of cheap air fares outweigh the benefits

Claims.Text: cheap air fares have broadened travel possibilities for many people, particularly for the lower income group
growing of cheap flights really have negative impact on environment

Premises.Text: These days, millions of people can travel around the world for work or pleasure
They can develop their careers, broad their knowledge, and interact with many other people from varied cultural backgrounds
travels also help to promote the tourist industry development, boost the economy and job markets of many countries
more flights could mean bigger and busier airport that may be grown the air pollution for people who live and work close to it
the biggest concern is the effect on global warming
Burning plane fuel can releases carbon dioxid into environment that cause the Earth to heat up
while many efforts are being made to reduce CO2 emissions from cars and factories, nothing is being done to reins the airlines
